question:
The teacher was well-loved by students, but he never ________ the work of teaching; in fact, planning lessons and facilitating group process only exacerbated his deep-seated anxieties about preparation and public speaking.
Two Answers
A. appreciated
B. fancied
C. abhorred
D. relished
E. detested
F. ascertained
